main.name: Kitty Cao
main.description: I am a full stack developer who devops
main.bio: As a Software Engineer with 3.5 years of experience across 7 companies with 6 being internships, I have developed backend APIs, scripted pipelines, automated infrastructure, and trained neural networks. My hobbies outside of computer science include reading, drawing, and educating. As an adopter of continuous learning, I strive to improve my technical and soft skills on a daily basis.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Software Engineer III
description: Programmed orchestration tool with Java, Spring Boot, and Camunda workflows for automating customer onboarding, reduced onboarding time from weeks to under 2 hours
Adopted hexagonal architecture in Spring Boot Java codebase to improve code quality for future tasks, cutting development time for new features by controlling class explosion
Architected discovery service for metadata to be used by cloud department for administering customer & internal Kubernetes clusters
Developed & deployed CICD tools (TeamCity, Bitbucket) with Terraform & Kubernetes, in use by 20+ tenants
Built retrospective site as a microservice in internal Kubernetes cluster, used by 86 teams

work.title: Advanced Analytics Intern
description: Aggregated suspicious AWS events collected through programmed Sumo Logic data analytics log operators for presentation at AWS re:Invent 2019
Maintained operators in Sumo Logic log search with Scala
Prototyped AWS attack cycle detector for monitored AWS events using Python, React, and Neo4j

work.title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Sped up the data cleaning of gaze-detection input features for CNN by 7 times
Revised input vector for eye gaze to improve detection accuracy
Automated the training and evaluation of ML networks through scripting CICD pipelines and starting data cleaning app as a Docker container in Nvidia’s GPU cloud
Reduced training time by 1.6 times through elimination of idle CPU time in Tensorflow

work.title: Ride Hailing Intern
description: Reduced amount of S3 storage required by 5 times, overhauling use of complete model objects to smaller deltas in storage for record keeping and rollback in a distributed system
Migrated historical events to new model without affecting production uptime, maintaining backwards compatibility in API
Ingested Kafka streams into SpringBoot backend for tracking rides in real-time
Sped up API update latency by 3 times through reducing model complexity in SQL database

work.title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Developed frontend interface for creating logic flows to orchestrate the training and evaluation of machine learning algorithms
Scripted GoCD for continous delivery of apps on Kubernetes to demo-able environment
Volunteered at external company meetups to educate and debug attendees' code for machine learning use cases captured in Jupyter notebooks

work.title: Software Intern
description: Migrated frontend site from AngularJS to Angular 2 with RxJS for improved management of asynchronous events
Automated backups of hosted Docker images through cloud EC2 instances for disaster recovery

work.title: Software Intern
description: Built email notification pipeline to alert on specialized trades
Developed full-stack app in C# & .NET framework to start jobs asynchronously and view queueing status
